text: Goulash (), is a soup of meat and vegetables seasoned with paprika and other spices.page 20 Goulash came from Hungary and is commonly eaten in Central Europe and other parts of Europe. It is one of the national dishes of Hungary and a symbol of the country. In Hungary, goulash is a soup and not a stew! title: Goulash
